title: New: Balam Acab – Motion
content:
Having already cemented his name as one of the artists of the year with his ambient dubstep influenced tracks, Balam Acab has dropped another cut that is set to feature on his upcoming full length LP.

Motion has a soulful vibe to it, that stirs imperceptibly beneath the languid synths and looped samples, with the first minute providing a fitting introduction for the rest of the track. It’s atmospheric yet strikingly engaging; showing that whilst this young producer may be relatively inexperienced, he certainly knows how to compose and manipulate his music. Check out Motion below, and watch out for Balam Acab’s full length LP Wander / Wonder which drops 29th April on Tri Angle Records.

Balam Acab – Motion by TriAngleRecords
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
